episodesJson.title: Cruising
episodesJson.description: This week, we watched the 1980 Al Pacino movie Cruising, about a serial killer stalking the gay S&M cruising community, and the undercover cop who maybe catches him. Or maybe is the killer himself? The movie's very confusing, but what we do know is that someone's getting fisted in the background of one of the scenes, so we're on board!
topics: How can Punch and Judy be more fun?
One of the wildest scenes we've ever seen
How to catch a serial killer who has no sperm
